SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT CUSTOMER_ID as "cusId", CUSTOMER_NAME as "cusNm", CUSTOMER_AUTONO as "autoNo", CUSTOMER_AUTOKIND as "autoKind", FN_CODENAME(CUSTOMER_AUTOKIND, 'KIND') kind, CUSTOMER_TEL as "cusTel", USE_YN as "useYN", NOTE as "note", AUTOINT as "autoInt", REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE( REVERSE(KILRO_TOTAL), '([0-9]{3})','\1,')), '^,','') AS "totalKm", (SELECT NVL(COUNT(1), 0) FROM CAR_TAKEREPAIR WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = X.CUSTOMER_ID AND TURNOVER ='Y') RepairCnt FROM CAR_CUSTOMER X WHERE 1=1
AND UPPER(CUSTOMER_NAME) LIKE '%' ||UPPER(#{searchname})|| '%'
AND UPPER(CUSTOMER_AUTONO) LIKE '%' ||UPPER(#{searchcarNum})|| '%'
AND REPLACE(CUSTOMER_TEL, '-', '') LIKE '%' ||#{searchTel}|| '%'
ORDER BY CUSTOMER_ID DESC) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{firstIndex} + 1 AND #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAR_CUSTOMER ( CUSTOMER_ID , CUSTOMER_NAME , CUSTOMER_AUTONO , CUSTOMER_AUTOKIND , CUSTOMER_TEL , NOTE , AUTOINT , KILRO_TOTAL) VALUES( SIRA('CAR_CUSTOMER', 'CUSTOMER_ID'), #{cusNm}, #{autoNo}, #{autoKind}, #{cusTel}, #{note}, SUBSTR(#{autoNo},-4), #{totalKm} )
mapper.select: SELECT CUSTOMER_ID cusId, CUSTOMER_NAME cusNm, CUSTOMER_AUTONO autoNo, CUSTOMER_AUTOKIND autoKind, CUSTOMER_TEL cusTel, USE_YN useYN, NOTE note, AUTOINT autoInt, KILRO_TOTAL totalKm FROM CAR_CUSTOMER WHERE CUSTOMER_ID=#{cusId}
mapper.update: UPDATE CAR_CUSTOMER SET CUSTOMER_AUTOKIND = #{autoKind}, CUSTOMER_NAME = #{cusNm}, CUSTOMER_TEL = #{cusTel}, KILRO_TOTAL = #{totalKm}, NOTE = #{note} WHERE CUSTOMER_ID=#{cusId}

SELECT TO_CHAR(TURNOVERTIME, 'YYYY')||'년 '||TO_CHAR(TURNOVERTIME, 'MM')||'월 '||TO_CHAR(TURNOVERTIME, 'DD')||'일 수리내역' turnOverTime, REPAIR_ENUM(TAKESEQ) repairName, REPAIRNOTE as repairNote, TAKESEQ as takeSeq, NVL(KILRO_NOW,0)||' km' AS totalKm, TURNOVERTIME FROM CAR_TAKEREPAIR WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = #{cusId} AND TURNOVER ='Y' UNION
SELECT TO_CHAR(TURNOVERTIME, 'YYYY')||'년 '||TO_CHAR(TURNOVERTIME, 'MM')||'월 ' turnOverTime, '' AS repairName, '' AS repairNote, '' AS TAKESEQ, REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(TO_CHAR(NVL(B.KILRO_TOTAL,0))), '(\d{3})','\1,')), '^,','')||' km' AS totalKm, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TURNOVERTIME), 'YYYYMMDD')||'235959' ,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') FROM CAR_TAKEREPAIR A, CAR_CUSTOMER B WHERE A.CUSTOMER_ID = #{cusId} AND A.CUSTOMER_ID = B.CUSTOMER_ID AND A.TURNOVER ='Y' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TURNOVERTIME, 'YYYY')||'년 '||TO_CHAR(TURNOVERTIME, 'MM')||'월 ', NVL(B.KILRO_TOTAL,0), TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TURNOVERTIME), 'YYYYMMDD')||'235959' ,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
